summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department authorizing the execution of an agreement with the City of Bellevue providing for the design, construction, operation, maintenance and the sharing of costs for two pumping stations at 152nd Avenue N.E. and N.E. 8th Street, and 145th Place S.E. and S.E. 28th Street, Bellevue, Washington and providing for the City of Seattle to obtain a 40 and 50 percent share respectively of the capacity of the two pumping stations in accordance with the terms and conditions of said agreement.
